name: Mafia Infiltration
description:
Mafia Infiltration is  a 3D  First Person  Shooter game. 

In the game you are an government agent and your mission is to mess up your local mafia's business.  

This project was created during  the TAMK Games Academy Grand Game Release    2021 course.  Our goal of the project was to gain more experience on Game development and creating 3D games in Unity.
